PROJECT BPCS

We have created the exceptional project that helps the community indeed. With the intention of providing relief to the people from frauds and theft. We have giving a unique platform where user have the independence to use the services without any fears. Moreover, in the BigProfitCoin-Service people can store their coins not only the BigProfitCoin but also many other including Masternodes.

COIN BPC

BigProfitCoin is not an ordinary coin or cryptocurrency it is the fuel of BPC-Service exchange. After, the release of the platform people wonâ€™t need to pay the high commission from their different coins wallet. BPC-Service will manage their commission and transaction fee through BigProfitCoin. Plus, they enjoy the POS mining profit. We will provide them many opportunities under the one BigProfitCoin-Service umbrella.

How it works

POS POOL COIN

1. Find the coin & Add it to dashboard

2. START POS & Get 10%-20% more

3. STOP POS & Withdrawful

4. Monthly fee once in a day in the equivalent of BPC coins

MASTERNODES
POOL COIN

1. Find the coin & Add it to dashboard

2. START MN (the required number of coins is shown automatically)

3. Get the deviants for the chosen wallet

4. STOP MN & Withdrawful

5. Monthly fee, in the equivalent of BPC coins

MARKETS

1. Choose a currency pair and make an exchange transaction.

2. Commission for the transaction is withdrawn as a percentage, in the equivalent of BPC coins.
